description:
Add an adventurous touch to the puzzle-solving experience and test your wit in the cabin or the lunchroom. Unique zentagle pieces represent wildlife in nature and it comes with a ripstop bag to hold them all in.

  • 185 wooden pieces to create a wild design to bring nature to you
  • Unique zentagle puzzle pieces give your brain a workout, after the physical one
  • Each puzzle piece is a slice of wildlife that brings nature within hands reach
  • Recycled ripstop carry bag hold all the pieces until you let them out to play
  • Finished size is around 30cm x 22cm so you can bring it to camp or work for lunchtime fun
name: Outside Inside Grizzly Bear Wood Puzzle
